name: Hotel Rose Garden Shinjuku

reviews.text: This review is not intended to "complain" about this hotel. My intention is to better prepare future potential customers so that they won't be as sad and disappointed as I was. I may have been somewhat misled by the reviews I read.
reviews.title: Be Mentally Prepared...then it's not so bad.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is definately a bargain hotel, very affordable and in a good location, near the Shinjuku night life and Subway/Train stations. It's more equivalent to the Days Inn in the states. Everything is satisfactory, but not luxurious by any means. Service was good, staff was friendly. Things to be mentally prepared about:
reviews.title: A great decision to stay here

reviews.text: - Smoke, lots of people smoke in Japan, so it's hard to avoid, but the smoke in the elevator was overwhelming and even though we had non smoking room, it still smelled like smoke. (turn on fan right when you get there and leave it on).
reviews.title: Perfect Location in Tokyo!!!

likes.disliked: — If I was forced to choose something I didnt like...My accomadation didnt come with Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Stained Carpet - this may just be the room I got, but the stained carpet in the shade of red, really grossed me out.
reviews.title: Great location!

likes.liked: — Close proximity to train stations and center of city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Overall I felt like the room was not very clean.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in a good location

likes.disliked: — all fine, although the room was smallish but fine for us

reviews.text: If you are looking for a hotel where you can yell something in the lobby and have it echo for the next half minute, this is not for you. My wife and I were booked into this boutique hotel by Japanese acquaintances and they knew what they were doing.
reviews.title: Boutique hotel, well located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for 3 nights, and was glad to have done so.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 30 second walk to the subway which is 1 stop from the huge Shinkiju train station. This subway station also has an underground tunnel to the tourist information office and city view towers.
reviews.title: Nice place, excellent price

reviews.text: The hotel has very friendly staff, smallish rooms, but very clean, mini bar with a few drinks in it. I paid about £85/night, good value which included Japanese & English breakfast.
reviews.title: Good experience at the Rose Garden
Great location, clean and comfortable
reviews.text: No English channel on the TV, but I didn't come to Japan to watch TV.

reviews.title: Very impressed by the Hotel Rose Garden
reviews.text: Tea and a kettle were also included.

description: Here is the your second house in Japan. we offer you relaxation and comfort. We providing guests with excellent access on foot and by car or train to the main business, entertainment, dining and shopping hot spots of Japan's capital.
